mapper.insert: insert into order_product_price (total_amout, discount, delivery, protect, invoice, card_price, paid_price, product_price) values (#{totalAmout}, #{discount}, #{delivery}, #{protect}, #{invoice}, #{cardPrice}, #{paidPrice}, #{productPrice})
mapper.update: update order_product_price set total_amout = #{totalAmout}, discount = #{discount}, delivery = #{delivery}, protect = #{protect}, invoice = #{invoice}, card_price = #{cardPrice}, paid_price = #{paidPrice}, product_price = #{productPrice} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, total_amout, discount, delivery, protect, invoice, card_price, paid_price, product_price from order_product_price where id = #{id}
select id, total_amout, discount, delivery, protect, invoice, card_price, paid_price, product_price from order_product_price
